name: Robo Gunslinger
description:
A short, fun platforming shooter. Take control of a robot cowboy who has lost one of his gunslinging arms on his quest to take it back from the bandits who stole it from him.

Controls:

  • WD -  move
  • Spacebar - Jump
  • Mouse/Arrow keys - shooting

Credits:

  • Ethan Nguyen: Programmer, Design
  • Autumn: Art, Programmer, Audio, Production
  • Em: Art, Programmer
